title: Peter Sagan
summary: Peter Sagan (Slovak pronunciation: [ˈpeter ˈsaɡan]; born 26 January 1990) is a Slovak professional road bicycle racer who currently rides for UCI WorldTeam Bora–Hansgrohe,[7] but will switch to UCI ProTeam Team TotalEnergies in 2022.[8] Sagan had a successful junior cyclo-cross and mountain bike racing career, winning the Junior Mountain Bike World Championship in 2008, before moving to road racing.
